title: Bloomberg Markets: High-End Chefs Embrace Bar Hybrids
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: High-End Chefs Embrace Bar Hybrids
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Kate Krader Reporter Bloomberg Pursuits Discussing how restaurant customers are turning away from traditional dining rooms to other formats, such as fast-casual spots or a seat at the bar.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
